subject: Programming
title: Monitoring and Observability
description: A quick win: understand Monitoring and Observability.

hook.text: You can't fix what you can't see. Modern systems need real-time insight into every layer.

buildup.text: Monitoring tracks metrics like CPU, memory, and error rates. Alerts fire when thresholds are crossed.

discovery.text: Observability goes deeper: logs, traces, and metrics together explain why a system behaves oddly.

twist.text: Too many alerts cause alert fatigue. Teams start ignoring notifications and miss real incidents.

climax.text: Great observability turns debugging from guesswork into science. You ask questions the data answers.

punchline.text: See everything, alert wisely, fix fast.

quiz.question: What is the difference between monitoring and observability?
options: Observability explains why, monitoring shows what
They are exactly the same thing
